title: The Advanced Digital Marketing Mastery Bundle
text:
Description

Access 8 courses & 200+ hours of content 24/7

Master the critical elements of the web, social media, mobile & content analytics to optimize your organization's ability to make highly informed business decisions

Master the many facets of SEO to manage inbound marketing initiatives

Learn the nuances of pay per click, display advertising, conversion optimization & web analytics

Become an expert in mobile, content & email marketing

Master the art of a systematic, repeatable framework that consistently increases conversion rates on landing pages, microsites & entire websites

Build a career in the digital marketing industry with this 8-course training! With over 200 hours of e-learning content, this bundle will cover advanced topics to help you upgrade your existing digital marketing skills. You will master the critical elements of web analytics, the many facets of SEO, nuances of pay per click programs, mobile/content/email marketing, and the art of website conversion. This is an online self-learning bundle, meaning you will receive the lecture videos and you can go through the course at your convenience. At the end of the training, you will receive a course completion certificate from Certs-School.
